#include <stdio.h>

int grid[101][101];

int main() {
    int m, n, i, j, c = 1, res;

    while(scanf("%d %d\n", &n, &m) == 2) {
        if (m == 0 && n == 0) break;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++) {
            for(j=0;j<m;j++)
                grid[i][j] = (getchar() == '*');
            getchar();
        }
        if (c != 1)
            printf("\n");
        printf("Field #%d:\n", c++);
        for(i=0;i<n;i++) {
            for(j=0;j<m;j++) {
                if (grid[i][j]) {
                    printf("*");
                    continue;
                }
                res = (i > 0 && grid[i-1][j])
                    + (i < n && grid[i+1][j])
                    + (j > 0 && grid[i][j-1])
                    + (j < m && grid[i][j+1])
                    + (i > 0 && j > 0 && grid[i-1][j-1])
                    + (i > 0 && j < m && grid[i-1][j+1])
                    + (i < n && j > 0 && grid[i+1][j-1])
                    + (i < n && j < m && grid[i+1][j+1]);
                printf("%d", res);
            }
            printf("\n");
        }
    }
	
	return 0;
}
